function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate infection control intervention in the Control group","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission and infection in the Control group","Mitigation":"Implement effective infection control measures in the Control group, such as UV lights or ionizers","Technologies":"UV lights, ionizers","People":"Control group members","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Imbalanced airflow between animal enclosures","Impact":"Unequal distribution of potentially contaminated air, increasing the risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Balance the airflow between animal enclosures to ensure equal distribution of air","Technologies":"Airflow measuring devices, dampers","People":"Facility maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility management"},{"Description":"Use of statistical analysis to compare TB infections between groups","Impact":"Misinterpretation of data leading to incorrect conclusions about the effectiveness of interventions","Mitigation":"Ensure thorough review and validation of statistical analysis methods","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software (SPSS)","People":"Researchers conducting the analysis","Owner":"Research team"}]}
